abstract.t: The document "Discovery of the IPv6 Prefix Used for IPv6 Address Synthesis" [RFC7050] specifies the Special Use Domain Name 'ipv4only.arpa', with certain precise special properties, but neglected to include a Domain Name Reservation Considerations section [RFC6761] formalizing those special properties. This document updates RFC 7050 and formally specifies the Special Use Domain Name rules for ipv4only.arpa.
